resources.string:
Welcome to Minima
 
 The complete blockchain solution
 
 You now have access to a decentralised value and information transfer network unlike anything you have seen before
 
 An open application ecosystem known as the MDS - MiniDAPP System - allows you to interface easily with this new paradigm
 
 Value, Information and Application - everything you need to do anything you want
 
 We are still working hard to fit all the pieces together but we hope you enjoy this taste of Freedom
 
 The Minima Team

Making a backup of your Minima node is VERY important.
 
 On Minima you are the only one who looks after your coins.
 
 Currently - backups are only valid for 1-2 months.
 
 The files are about 500Kb.. so not very big.

You can easily restore from a backup.
 
 Once you have restored Minima will shutdown.
 
 When finished - please re-open Minima and your data will have been restored.

You can also resync from an Archive Node - but this should be as a LAST resort
 
 You can reset your chain to the latest tip or you can reset your NEW device to an old wallet
 
 When finished - please re-open Minima and your data will have been restored.

Do NOT copy / paste your seed phrase here!
 
 The clipboard is insecure
 
 Either leave blank for a simple tip resync - if you are on the wrong chain - OR type each word individually and let the suggestions help you to reset your whole wallet..
Encrypt your private keys with a password.\n \n You will not be able to send any coins or sign anything.
Decrypt your private keys with your password.\n \n You will be able to send coins and sign again.

You can re-sync JUST the Minima blockchain.
 
 This will leave your wallet and keys untouched.
 
 You can do this if you find yourself on the wrong chain.

As a last resort you can re-sync your entire wallet.
 
 If you lose your phone, and do not have a backup you can use JUST your seed phrase to do a complete Wallet re-sync.
 
 Your wallet and keys will be reset to the chosen seed phrase and all blocks re-downloaded.

Minima allows you to securely transact and communicate - without banks and without borders - with anyone else on the network.
The blockchain you are running ensures your transactions are secure and unalterable. Everyone running a Minima node shares this blockchain.
MiniDapps allow you to view information from the blockchain and interact with it, for example to send transactions.
Your node is unique to you, only YOU hold your data and funds.\n\nYou are independent and sovereign.
This Freedom comes with responsibility. Freedom is not Free. Make sure you make a backup regularly, at least once a month, and have a copy of your seed phrase.
You can do this.\n\nEmbrace it - and never look back.
